original_text: God may give someone lots of money and valuable things. People also respect that person. He has everything that he wants. He has worked hard to get them. But God does not allow him to enjoy those things. Instead, a stranger enjoys all that person's things. This has no purpose. It is a terrible thing to happen to someone.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 그의 영혼이 바라는 모든 소원에 부족함이 없어 재물과 부요와 존귀를 하나님께 받았으나 하나님께서 그가 그것을 누리도록 허락하지 아니하셨으므로 다른 사람이 누리나니 이것도 헛되어 악한 병이로다

sentences.original_text: God may give someone lots of money
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 어떤 사람에게 많은 돈을 주실 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: He has everything that he wants
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 원하는 모든 것을 가지고 있다

sentences.original_text: He has worked hard to get them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 얻기 위해 열심히 일했다

sentences.original_text: But God does not allow him
It is a terrible thing to happen to someone
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 어떤 사람에게 일어나는 끔찍한 일이다
